ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 1
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Animated Celebration Presents The Scheimer Barrier
ComicInfo.Summary: Kirk, Spock, Arex, and company tangle with a rogue scientist intent on proving his wild theory that the universe is actually a comic book. What if he's right? And what if he develops the godlike powers of the comic book artist? And what if that power has driven him mad? Will our heroes find a way to defeat him and restore the universe?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:59:26. [CVDB1014662]
ComicInfo.Characters: Fontana, James T. Kirk, M'Ress, Montgomery Scott, Nyota Uhura, Spock
